Mark as read

Marks a notification as "read" removes it from the default view on GitHub Enterprise Server.

PUT /notifications

Parameters

Name Type Description
last_read_at string Describes the last point that notifications were checked. Anything updated since this time will not be updated. This is a timestamp in ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ. Default: The current timestamp.

Response

Status: 205 Reset Content
